name: Pjtk3
text: Had a great charter with Capt Rick from Alabama Girl Fishing at Ft Morgan, AL. We did the “Near” shore 4 hour fishing trip. He has a smallish boat but it was just the right size for us.  We fished the old lighthouse and the Red Fish were biting and fighting!  The kids loved it!  First we tried for speckled trout near the docks and had no luck but luckily our change of scenery paid off.

name: Emerson Oliver
text: Not recommended.  Expensive chartered fishing trip and we mainly stayed within site of the marina and caught only one tiny fish.  He had us back at just before the 4 hour mark from the scheduled meeting time.  This was my 3rd chartered fishing trip out of gulf shores/fort morgan.  Had an amazing time the last 2 times and caught a lot of fish each time.  This one was a $500 dud.  Not recommended.

name: Dave Sorenson
text:
Ordered Lakemaster for SE Lakes.  Received it BUT nothing inside!
Called them 3 times to overnight me the micro SD card.    No one was able to help me.  So now they stole $125 from me!    Stay Away!

name: Wayne Peck
text: Showed up 3 min before 7 to deliver and the lady made a big deal out of it. She acts like she works for NASA or something. Chill lady you're not saving the world.

name: Jason Glew
text: While updating unit, it bonkered out and went black.  From the very start of getting it serviced and fixed to when it was shipped back to me was seamless.  Very responsive and care for your unit.  I don’t think I’ll ever use a different product.  Customer service is everything to me and these guys in Eufaula from Hummingbird hit it out of the park.

name: cliff hughes
text: Getting someone on the phone was really tough..But once I did, I had one of the best customer expieiences I have ever had..I had a cracked screen on my hummin bird helix. A two day turn around from a company this big definitely  surpassed my expections!! Outstanding!! Thank you Sonya, Brandon and daffanie!!  Very happy with my hummin bird products!! Thx Ciff

name: Ronald Payne
text: Very good people working there. They have a lot of patience with old folks like me.

name: Brandon Ray
text: Amazing people that care about the products they produce and the people who use them. A family for sure, and they make some of the best marine electronics on the market.

name: Brian Parker
text: Crystal Evans is a Hard worker and a damned good Person. 💯👊

name: Destin DeMarion
text: Had a unit that had a small issue and sent it back to get fixed.  Customer service rep was very helpful and turnaround was very quick, which I appreciated.  After they received it, it was back to me within two days.  Great experience on my end.
